item.title: Watch the videos from #nsec18
item.description:
All our conference talks are finally on YouTube for your enjoyment and edification. Watch them now!!

Also, remember that our 2018 photos are available Google Photos, go check them out!

Don’t forget to join our Slack or follow us on Twitter to get the latest news.

item.title: NorthSec 2018 Pictures Are In!
item.description:
NorthSec 2018 Pictures Are In!

We finally published this year’s pictures on Google Photos, check them out!

Don’t forget to join our Slack or follow us on Twitter to get the latest news.

item.title: Double the Workshops and Double the Conference Tracks!
item.description:
Big News for the 2018 Conference!

This year, for the first time ever, NorthSec’s Conference will feature two tracks for both Workshops and Talks. We have received so many good proposals that we had no choice but to find a way to accommodate all these awesome speakers.

It is important to keep in mind that the number of tracks will NOT drive proposal selection: it will stay the other way around, so as to ensure that our very high quality of presentations and workshops stays unaffected by this change.

Don’t Wait!

Don’t miss out on the LAST early bird prices, get your tickets as soon as possible!

item.title: Welcome to NorthSec's 2018 New Website!
item.description:
As NorthSec 2018 shapes up, we’re excited to launch our new Website and open registrations and CFP at the same time.

This year, the event will take place in the same great venue that is the Marché Bonsecours, in Old Montreal, Canada. As you all know, Montreal is an exceptional city, often cited as one of the best party/hedonistic city & regularly named as part of the best traveller’s choice.

The event continues to grow year after year, and here is what we expect for this year’s edition:

  • Attendance: We’re expecting over 700 attendees throughout all the event.
  • Talks+Workshops: Last year’s workshop were a great success, we’ll bring them back this year!
  • Date: May 14-20 2018, Pro Training Sessions May 14-15-16, Conference May 17-18, CTF May 18-19-20.
  • Venue: Marché Bonsecours
  • Speakers: The CFP is already running, submit your great proposals!

Looking forward to seeing you all in Montreal next May!
